posts.post_content: This might be an unusual way of searching for cards, but I have scans of some really nice examples i'm interested in tracking down. if you own one of these (or have similar) and would consider selling or trading, please send me a PM. thanks!

This one is coming up in Goodwin. Good luck!!!!!!!!

[url]http://www.goodwinandco.com/-Extremely-Scarce-Del-Pratt-1914-Cracker-Jack-(PSA-LOT26421.aspx[/url]

[IMG]http://www.goodwinandco.com/ItemImages/000026/58a_med.jpeg[/IMG]

Bump for Michael, plus wanted to provide an updated link to the miscut Lajoie:

[url]http://goodwinandco.com/1909-Piedmont-150-Subjects-T206-Nap-Lajoie-Throwin-Lot26676.aspx[/url]
sick miscut! mike show the polar bear;) you deserved that card my friend:)

Just bumping this thread. Aggressively seeking miscut T206's- back, front, etc. 

Could be an all cash deal (although some sort of trade could be an option too, if appealing), please PM me for discreet transaction.

Best-
Michael

(Edited to add my PB miscut for Johnny...first card he ever let go :) thanks bud!)
